rex_firebase_itemtable.name: Item table
rex_firebase_itemtable.description: Items table indexed by (itemID, key), supports writing a item or reading items back.

domain.name: Domain
domain.desc: The root location of the Firebase data.

onsavecomplete1.description: Triggered when save current item complete.

tag0.name: Tag

onloadcomplete11.description: Triggered when load current item complete.

tag0.name: Tag
tag0.desc: A tag, to distinguish between different save requests.

foreachıtemıd12.description: Repeat the event for each itemID of load result.

foreachkey13.description: Repeat the event for each key of a item of load result.

oncleanallcomplete31.description: Triggered when remove all items complete.

oncleanallerror32.description: Triggered when remove all items error.

setvalue1.display-text: Prepare- Set key [i]{0}[/i] to  [i]{1}[/i] in current item

value1.name: Value

set_mode3.desc: Update, or clean then set item values

curıtemıd1.description: Get current itemID in a For Each loop, in last load result. Or in save/remove callback.

loadresulttojson2.description: Get load reslt in JSON string.

curkey3.description: Get current key in a For Each loop, in last load result.

curvalue4.description: Get current value in a For Each loop, in last load result.

at5.description: Get value by itemId and key in last load result. Add 3rd parameter for default value if this key is not existed.

curıtemcontent7.description: Get current content in JSON stringin in a For Each loop, in last load result. Add 2nd parameter for specific key, 3rd parameter for default value if this key is not existed.

generatekey21.description: Generate new key from push action.

lastgeneratedkey22.description: Get last generate a key from push action.

ref101.description: Get renerence in table, optional parameters are (itemID, key).
